abstract: The Boeing Dreamliner was in preflight runway testing when the engine threw off debris and started a grass fire.
snippet: The Boeing Dreamliner was in preflight runway testing when the engine threw off debris and started a grass fire.
lead_paragraph: The National Transportation Safety Board is investigating why debris fell from an engine on a new Boeing 787 Dreamliner during a preflight test Saturday in South Carolina, Boeing officials said Sunday.

headline.main: Safety Board Investigates Debris From a 787’s Engine
headline.print_headline: Safety Board Investigates Debris From a 787’s Engine
